text.p:
POEMS AND SONGS
BY
MARY MACPHERSON .

DAIN AGUS ORAIN
GHAIDHLIG
LE
MAIRI NIC - A - PHEARSOIN
( MAIRI , NIGHEAN IAIN BHAIN ) ,

LIFE OF MRS . MARY MACPHERSON ,
THE SKYE POETESS .

Imthigh , a Dhuilleachan , gu dan ,
Le dan glan Gàidhlig duisg iad thall ;
Cuir failte ar fonn fial nab Fionn ,
Ar Gharbh - chriocha is Innseadh Gall .
